title: >>> KINGDOM Come
body_text:
Congratulations once again to the "Top 21" as all of you have a golden opportunity to headline DODGEBALL 100 with the second captains drawing this coming Saturday at DODGEBALL 93! But remember, you must attend for your chance to win ...
Alison Bertsch, Chris Adams, Dan Spengeman, Derek Carty, Diana DiBuccio, John Tronolone, Justin Pierce*, Kevin Adams*, Kevin Fitzpatrick, Kevin Megill, Lauren Freda, Lauren Winston, Lenny Herrera, Mike Krott, Rob Avakian, Ryan Letsche, Ryan McCrorey, Sara DeCuir, Steve Adams, Tom Adams, Valerie Winston.
*Won the first drawing at DODGEBALL 90*
................
CREAMation Rules
? Forget it.
Pick Your Poison
? Not a chance.
Captains? Throw them out the window.
For the first time ever, members of the famed Wall High School
Knights
, past or present, will come together comprising one of the most destructive armies in history known as
Team WALL
.
The opposing forces will be a combination of superstars from various high schools. Ranging from the Ocean Township Spartans and the Falcons of Monmouth Regional to the Allentown Redbirds and yes, the rival Manasquan Blue Warriors. It is these soldiers that will make up
Team ALL
, ready and willing to annihilate the
Knights
on their own home turf.
________________________________________
____________
Possible Members of
Team WALL
:
Ryan Letsche ('03)
Alison Bertsch ('02)
Kevin Fitzpatrick ('05)
Justin Pierce ('02)
Chris Adams ('00)
Melissa Kerr ('06)
Tom Adams ('05)
Sascha Basista ('08)
Sara DeCuir ('04)
Kevin Adams ('08)
Possible Members of
Team ALL
:
Mike Edwards (
Ocean Township
'04)
Diana DiBuccio (
Allentown
'02)
Kevin Megill (
Manasquan
'01)
Dan Turner (
Monsignor Donovan
'04)
Lauren Stopa (
Manasquan
'05)
Grant Cornero (
M.A.S.T.
'08)
Valerie Winston (
Monmouth Regional
'02)
Juan Londono (
Manasquan
'01)
Mike Butler (
Neptune
'01)
John Tronolone (
Monmouth Regional
'02)
________________________________________
____________
Will
Team WALL
stand tall and proud on their own court?
Or will
Team ALL
publically humiliate and embarrass the
Knights
?
Keep in mind, there will be some additions to each army.
You never know who is going to show up!
body_html:
Congratulations once again to the "Top 21" as all of you have a golden opportunity to headline DODGEBALL 100 with the second captains drawing this coming Saturday at DODGEBALL 93! But remember, you must attend for your chance to win ...

Alison Bertsch, Chris Adams, Dan Spengeman, Derek Carty, Diana DiBuccio, John Tronolone, Justin Pierce*, Kevin Adams*, Kevin Fitzpatrick, Kevin Megill, Lauren Freda, Lauren Winston, Lenny Herrera, Mike Krott, Rob Avakian, Ryan Letsche, Ryan McCrorey, Sara DeCuir, Steve Adams, Tom Adams, Valerie Winston.

*Won the first drawing at DODGEBALL 90*

................


CREAMation Rules? Forget it.
Pick Your Poison? Not a chance.
Captains? Throw them out the window.

For the first time ever, members of the famed Wall High School Knights, past or present, will come together comprising one of the most destructive armies in history known as Team WALL.

The opposing forces will be a combination of superstars from various high schools. Ranging from the Ocean Township Spartans and the Falcons of Monmouth Regional to the Allentown Redbirds and yes, the rival Manasquan Blue Warriors. It is these soldiers that will make up Team ALL, ready and willing to annihilate the Knights on their own home turf.
____________________________________________________

Possible Members of Team WALL:
Ryan Letsche ('03)
Alison Bertsch ('02)
Kevin Fitzpatrick ('05)
Justin Pierce ('02)
Chris Adams ('00)
Melissa Kerr ('06)
Tom Adams ('05)
Sascha Basista ('08)
Sara DeCuir ('04)
Kevin Adams ('08)



Possible Members of Team ALL:
Mike Edwards (Ocean Township '04)
Diana DiBuccio (Allentown '02)
Kevin Megill (Manasquan '01)
Dan Turner (Monsignor Donovan '04)
Lauren Stopa (Manasquan '05)
Grant Cornero (M.A.S.T. '08)
Valerie Winston (Monmouth Regional '02)
Juan Londono (Manasquan '01)
Mike Butler (Neptune '01)
John Tronolone (Monmouth Regional '02)
____________________________________________________

Will Team WALL stand tall and proud on their own court?
Or will Team ALL publically humiliate and embarrass the Knights?

Keep in mind, there will be some additions to each army.
You never know who is going to show up!
